Package ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.user.services

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthService
    This class represents an auth service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    This class describes the local behaviour of the account model regardless of the Database provider.
    AccountData
    Class that represents the data content of an account.
    AuthAccount
    This class represents the local account model of an authenticated user.
    FirebaseAuthService
    This class describes the Auth service provided by Firebase.
    OtherAccount
    This class represents the local account model of an non-authenticated user.
    RemoteAccountDataFactory
    This class implements helper methods that can generate an AccountData retrieving data from the DB.
    RemoteAuthAccount
    This class extends AuthAccount to handle operations on a Database
    RemoteOtherAccount
    This class extends Account implementing RemoteResource in order to handle DB interaction.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuthProvider
    Enum describing the possible providers of auth for users.
